mapper.select: SELECT a.* from (SELECT ROWNUM r, prod.* from (SELECT p.*,i.product_img_no FROM product_tb p INNER JOIN product_img_tb i ON (p.product_no = i.product_no) WHERE product_disp_st NOT IN ('D', 'P') AND i.product_img_no = (SELECT max(product_img_no) from product_img_tb where product_no = p.product_no) ORDER BY product_view desc )prod)a WHERE a.r < 5
